title: Course on Enhancing Instructional Design Model Efficiency Using Blended Teaching Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Application of blended teaching methods reflecting post-positivist perspectives, focused on science domain practical training

learning_goals: Learners can design science experiment simulations using the ADDIE and ASSURE models
Learners can analyze motivational elements in VR-based learning content by applying the ARCS model
Learners can propose solutions to complex scientific problems by combining project-based learning with cognitive apprenticeship
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
